thread.title: Wes Streeting: Trans doctors' disciplinary history must not be erased
thread.title_full: Wes Streeting: Trans doctors' disciplinary history must not be erased

author: Ellie McDonald
title: Wes Streeting: Trans doctors' disciplinary history must not be erased
text:
Wes Streeting: Trans doctors’ disciplinary history must not be erased The health secretary demands immediate changes after an investigation found wrongdoings are removed from the public record of medics who change gender new Ellie McDonald Friday February 21 2025, 12.01am, The Times Wes Streeting said he expected the General Medical Council to address the issue KARL BLACK/ALAMY Ellie McDonald Friday February 21 2025, 12.01am, The Times Wes Streeting has raised concerns after an investigation found that doctors who change gender are able to have past wrongdoings removed from the public record.
The health secretary said the General Medical Council (GMC), which regulates doctors, should urgently overhaul its practices, saying the situation should “not have been allowed”.
The GMC holds a public register of all doctors which allows the public to check if a medic has been made subject to restrictions, suspensions or struck off.
On Thursday it admitted that it erases public disciplinary history of doctors who change gender identities, raising the prospect that medics seeking to hide their disciplinary history could exploit the system by transitioning to erase their past.
Streeting has demanded immediate changes from the regulator. He told
